channel.title: Comments on: Transactional Replication from Availability Groups to Azure SQL Database: Part 3 – The Publisher
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jorge
item.dc:creator: Jorge
item.description:
Hi again, so isn´t there a problem if a have a publisher with a redirect distributor and after configure another publisher using same distributor? Can i use same distribution database?
THX
item.content:encoded:
Hi again,
so isn´t there a problem if a have a publisher with a redirect distributor and after configure another publisher using same distributor? Can i use same distribution database?

THX

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: Multiple publishers can make use of the same distribution server, yes. I'd be careful to not overload the distributor server with too many transactions at any one time.
item.content:encoded: Multiple publishers can make use of the same distribution server, yes. I’d be careful to not overload the distributor server with too many transactions at any one time.

item.title: By: Jorge
item.dc:creator: Jorge
item.description: Hi Jes, is it possible to redirect different publishers from different cluster nodes within the same distributor?
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jes,
is it possible to redirect different publishers from different cluster nodes within the same distributor?

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: You're welcome! I'm glad it was useful.
item.content:encoded: You’re welcome! I’m glad it was useful.
